detachments.name: Rad-Zone Corps
detachments.lore: Rad-Zone Corps forces are masters of radiological warfare, flooding the battlefield with lethal rad-saturated zones.

rule.name: Rad-Suffusion
rule.description: Each time a RAD-ZONE CORPS CORE or BATTLELINE unit shoots, if it has the Rad-Saturation ability, enemy units that suffer one or more hits improve to suffer -1 Toughness until end of turn.

enhancements.name: Rad-Suffusion Matrix
enhancements.description: Bearer's unit has +1 Rad-Saturation stacks per model in target unit.

detachments.name: Skitarii Hunter Cohort
detachments.lore: The Hunter Cohort are precision operatives who identify high-value targets and coordinate devastating strikes.

rule.name: Hunters of the Machine God
rule.description: SKITARII HUNTER COHORT units can re-roll one Hit roll and one Wound roll per activation when targeting the same enemy unit that was targeted last turn.

enhancements.name: Hunter-Designation Uplink
enhancements.description: Once per battle round, bearer can designate an enemy unit as a priority target. Friendly SKITARII units re-roll wound rolls against that unit.

detachments.name: Maniple Assault Force
detachments.lore: When the Omnissiah demands close engagement, the Assault Maniple answers with brutal efficiency.

rule.name: Assault Protocols
rule.description: MANIPLE ASSAULT FORCE units have the ASSAULT keyword for all weapons. At the end of a successful Charge, units gain +1 to Wound rolls until end of turn.

enhancements.name: Motive Force Surge
enhancements.description: Bearer's unit can make an additional move action after making a charge move.

detachments.name: Cohort Cybernetica
detachments.lore: A Cohort Cybernetica unleashes the full potential of Mechanicus automata in overwhelming robotic formations.

rule.name: Cybernetica Battle Protocols
rule.description: KASTELAN ROBOT units in COHORT CYBERNETICA armies have their Battle Protocols active from round 1 without requiring a Cybernetica Datasmith.

enhancements.name: Noospheric Commander
enhancements.description: Bearer can issue orders to up to 2 CORE units per Command phase instead of 1.

detachments.name: Elimination Maniple
detachments.lore: The Elimination Maniple combines lethality and subtlety, deploying Sicarian operatives to shatter enemy command structures.

rule.name: Priority Target Deletion
rule.description: ELIMINATION MANIPLE units can target CHARACTER units even if they are not the closest eligible target. Against CHARACTER units, improve AP by 1.

enhancements.name: Target-Lock Cortex
enhancements.description: Bearer's unit has LETHAL HITS against CHARACTER units.

detachments.name: Archaeopter Support
detachments.lore: Through dominance of the skies, the Archaeopter Support detachment coordinates devastating ground strikes and recon missions.

rule.name: Aerial Supremacy
rule.description: ARCHAEOPTER SUPPORT ARCHAEOPTER units can target units that Advanced or Fell Back. At the end of your Command phase, you can transfer one order to an ARCHAEOPTER unit within 12" of an OFFICER.

enhancements.name: Skies of Mars
enhancements.description: Bearer's ARCHAEOPTER unit adds 4" to its Move characteristic and ignores penalty for moving and shooting Heavy weapons.

forge_worlds.name: Mars — Cradle of Technology
forge_worlds.lore: The birthplace of the Adeptus Mechanicus, Mars forges the finest warriors with unmatched access to ancient knowledge.

ability_modifiers.description: Once per battle, one MARS unit can re-roll all dice for a single shooting attack.

forge_worlds.name: Graia — The Vigilant Forge
forge_worlds.lore: Forgeworld Graia produces warriors of exceptional endurance, their minds hardened by ceaseless warfare.

ability_modifiers.description: GRAIA units ignore the penalty to combat effectiveness from suffering half wounds.

forge_worlds.name: Metalica — The Iron Forge
forge_worlds.lore: Metalica produces warriors whose aggressive march-fire tactics overwhelm enemy positions before they can react.

ability_modifiers.description: METALICA units do not suffer the penalty to BS for advancing and shooting Assault weapons.

forge_worlds.name: Stygies VIII — The Dark Forge
forge_worlds.lore: Shrouded in secrecy, Stygies VIII uses unorthodox methods and clandestine protocols to bring victory at any cost.

ability_modifiers.description: STYGIES VIII units gain the INFILTRATORS keyword and can deploy in the opponent's deployment zone if more than 9" from enemy units.

forge_worlds.name: Lucius — The Hollow Mountain
forge_worlds.lore: The Hollow Mountain's warriors are masters of defensive warfare, their bodies reinforced with reactive armour plating.

ability_modifiers.description: Once per battle, LUCIUS units can be set up in teleport strike at the end of the opponent's movement phase.

doctrines.name: Protector Doctrina
doctrines.active_description: ⬡ PROTECTOR ACTIVE — +1 BS (Ranged) • Heavy • -1 Hit vs Melee

doctrines.name: Conqueror Doctrina
doctrines.active_description: ⬡ CONQUEROR ACTIVE — +1 WS (Melee) • Assault • +1 AP (near Battleline)
